{"id":548162047,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 4 months","timestamp":1630555317,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"48 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/548162047/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Array Nesting","memory":"31.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int arrayNesting(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int ans = 0;\n        int dp[nums.size()];\n        for(int i = 0; i < nums.size(); i++)\n        {\n            dp[i] = 0;\n        }\n        for(int x = 0; x < nums.size(); x++)\n        {\n            if(dp[x] > 0) continue;\n            std::vector<bool> seen(nums.size());\n            std::vector<int> set;\n            int k = x;\n\n            int len = 0;\n            while(!seen[k])\n            {\n                \n                set.push_back(k);\n                seen[k] = true;\n                \n                k = nums[k];\n                len++;\n            }\n            for(const auto &n: set)\n            {\n                dp[n] = len;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        for(const auto &x: dp)\n        {\n            ans = std::max(x, ans);\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"array-nesting","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
